tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE treatment (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    drug_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_genetics(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES drug_list(drug_id)
);
